T02D1720:88a-1: sv'apna t'a ra no pik / bod skad du /
T02D1720:88a-2: rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1720:88a-3: 'phags ma rmi lam sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1720:88a-4: prin bral mkha' dkyil zla rgyas gzugs //
T02D1720:88a-5: rab dkar bsil ba'i 'od ldan ma //
T02D1720:88a-6: ma lus rmi lam gsal mdzad de'i //
T02D1720:88a-7: zhabs la mgos ba tud de bsgrub bshad //
T02D1720:88a-8: dge bas rab tu sngar langs te //
T02D1720:88a-9: gdong sogs dag byas dri zhim byugs //
T02D1720:88a-10: rje btsun de rten mdun bdar la //
T02D1720:88a-11: yid 'ong mchod bas mdzes par byas //
T02D1720:88a-12: skyabs gsum lha mor bcas pa la //
T02D1720:88a-14: mi dge med pa'i sems ldan pas //
T02D1720:88a-15: thog mar bsod nams tshogs bsags bya //
T02D1720:88a-16: aom aamri ta kunda li han ha na sarba bighnam
T02D1720:88a-17: ta da ha ti da ha sarba b'a pam h'um
T02D1720:88a-18: phat sv'a h'a / 'khyil pa khros pa'i sngags 'di yis //
T02D1720:88a-19: rmi lam bar chad bgegs bsal la //
T02D1720:88a-21: mkha' la 'phags ma bsgom par bya //
T02D1720:88a-22: rab mdzes pam las chu skyes snum 'jam gsal zhing gsar ba'i 'dab tshogs rgyas //
T02D1720:88a-23: de steng dkar bsil ri bong 'dzin 'khyil de dbus khams gsum rgyas 'gengs t'am //
T02D1720:88a-24: kun nas mun sel skar ma'i rgyal po 'od bzang mdog can rab 'phros las //
T02D1720:88a-25: yongs gyur 'phags ma rmi lam sgrol ma zhi mdog ma mdzes ma blta //
T02D1720:88a-26: rab dkar lang tsho rgyas pa'i gzugs //
T02D1720:88a-27: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin mdzad //
T02D1720:88b-0: @88b autpala sngo 'dzin 'gying tshul sgeg / mtshungs med gcig pos kun khyab ma'o //
T02D1720:88b-1: dri zhim dbu skra bzang 'khyil li //
T02D1720:88b-2: lha rdzas rin chen du mas brgyan //
T02D1720:88b-3: mthing ga'i dar gyis stod g-yogs shing //
T02D1720:88b-4: sna tshogs kha dog sham thabs mnabs //
T02D1720:88b-5: mu tig phreng ba'i dra ba yis mnyam par mdzes pa'i ska rags dang //
T02D1720:88b-6: ga sha se ral khar bcings shing //
T02D1720:88b-7: cod pan don yod grub pas brgyan //
T02D1720:88b-8: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang skyil krung gis //
T02D1720:88b-9: srid dang zhi la mi gnas shing //
T02D1720:88b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs //
T02D1720:88b-11: spu sgo kun nas rab 'phro ba'o ;
T02D1720:88b-13: bkug la mchod pas mnyes byas bstim //
T02D1720:88b-14: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1720:88b-15: byin rlabs phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bsngags //
T02D1720:88b-16: de rnams mandala mchod bcas pas //
T02D1720:88b-17: gus par phul la gsol ba gdab //
T02D1720:88b-18: zhal zas btung ba bzang ldan pa //
T02D1720:88b-19: dkar gsum mngar gsum me tog dbul //
T02D1720:88b-20: rin chen phreng ba dkar thogs te //
T02D1720:88b-21: ma yengs blo yis 'phags ma la //
T02D1720:88b-22: rtse gcig yid gtad gsang sngags mchog /'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas //
T02D1720:88b-24: de nas zang zing med par ni //
T02D1720:88b-25: rang gzhan don du rmi ltas brtag / grong ba'i chos kyis ma sbags pa'i //
T02D1720:88b-26: bu mo dus bzang dag la mchod //
T02D1720:88b-27: dri zhim khrus byas gos rgyan mdzes //
T02D1720:88b-28: rol mo'i grangs sam brgyad dam bdun //
T02D1720:88b-30: zas dkar zho dang 'o ma sbyin //
T02D1720:88b-31: 'gron bu dar sogs yon byin la //
T02D1720:88b-32: dung chos chus gtor ci bder dengs //
T02D1720:88b-33: de rjes byi dor dril ldan pa'i //
T02D1720:88b-34: khang par tshangs spyod brtul zhugs gnas //
T02D1720:88b-35: sngags su me tog dri zhim gyis //
T02D1720:88b-36: byugs pa'i mandala bzang byas la //
T02D1720:88b-37: mchod pa lnga dang khyad par du //
T02D1720:88b-38: gu gul mar me dbul bar bya ;
T02D1720:88b-39: /'jim ril sran ma'i tshad bcos te //
T02D1720:88b-40: kunda li yi sngags bdun gyis //
T02D1720:88b-41: btab la nyi shu rtsa gcig ni //
T02D1720:88b-42: phyogs bcur gtor bas bar chad zlog / gsum bdun gcig ni rin po cher //
T02D1720:88b-43: bsgoms pas mandala steng du dbul //
T02D1720:88b-44: stan la dgram dang gzung bar bya //
T02D1720:89a-0: @89a * // de rjes gang 'dod gsol btab nyal //
T02D1720:89a-1: aom sv'apna t'a ra sv'apna aa ba lo ki ni /
T02D1720:89a-2: tree lo kya ni rdarsha ni /
T02D1720:89a-3: tree lo kya badzri ra ni /
T02D1720:89a-4: bhu tam bha bam bha ba si sham /
T02D1720:89a-5: shu bha shu tam mi sad tye ka tha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1720:89a-6: brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu gcig / yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya //
T02D1720:89a-7: gsol btab sngags 'dis yid ches pas //
T02D1720:89a-8: lan cig bzlas kyang mi 'grub med //
T02D1720:89a-9: de tshe 'phags ma bdun gyi mtha' las phyogs bcur 'od mdzad thugs ka las byung bsil zer gyis //
T02D1720:89a-10: bdag snying gdung bsal thab thib dra ba ma lus spangs te sprin med mkha' ltar dag byas nas //
T02D1720:89a-11: glang chen sna 'dra'i phyag mdzes ring brkyang bdud rtsi can las bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab snying sogs bkang //
T02D1720:89a-12: de mthus lus kun kun nas dri med shel bum mchog ltar gtsang zhing rab dag yid 'ong 'gyur //
T02D1720:89a-13: de 'og rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad //
T02D1720:89a-14: lha mo mchog la rtsa gcig tu //
T02D1720:89a-15: ma yengs sems kyi dal bus ni //
T02D1720:89a-16: ji srid gnyis log par du bzlas //
T02D1720:89a-17: seng ge'i nyal stabs dge bas nyal //
T02D1720:89a-18: bag yod dran dang ma bral ba //
T02D1720:89a-19: dngos sam brda'am tshig dag gis //
T02D1720:89a-20: dge dang mi dge mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1720:89a-21: thub pas sna tshogs las grub kyis//
T02D1720:89a-22: rgyud du gang gsungs lha mo che'i //
T02D1720:89a-23: brtag pa don kun sgrub byed 'di //
T02D1720:89a-24: rmi lam spro lam yang dag bshad //
T02D1720:89a-25: rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon zla ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1720:89a-27: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta su ga ta shr'i dang /
